title: PlayDate Digital & Hasbro, Inc. Team Up to Publish the First Ever LITTLEST PET SHOP Storybook App--LITTLEST PET SHOP: PET STYLE

Style the pets and watch them display their runway fashions to save the LITTLEST PET SHOP!
NEW YORK , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- We all talk to our pets, but imagine if they could understand you and even talk back to you! Blythe Baxter , a small-town girl who just moved to the big city, discovers her special ability in the nick of time--but will it be enough to save the LITTLEST PET SHOP from going out of business? LITTLEST PET SHOP: PET STYLE is an interactive storybook app from PlayDate Digital, under license from Hasbro, Inc. The app is based off the hit animated series LITTLEST PET SHOP, airing on Discovery Family in the United States .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278634
When Blythe stumbles upon a group of pets chattering away in the LITTLEST PET SHOP day camp below her apartment, she has no idea what fun is in store for her! It's going to take Blythe's keen eye for style, a bunch of talented pets, and the reader's help to save the day with a pet fashion show.
"Combining the unique personalities of Blythe and the pets from the television series with the collectability of the toy line has been quite exciting! We wanted to create an engaging experience for children in our debut storybook app for the LITTLEST PET SHOP brand," said Shaan Kandawalla , Co-Founder of PlayDate Digital. "Through the app's interactive features, like decorating Blythe's room, collecting deco bits, and styling the pets for the runway, the child can personalize, customize, and share their creations with friends!"
"We are so thrilled that our LITTLEST PET SHOP characters are being brought to life in a completely new way via a beautifully designed storybook app," said Samantha Lomow , Senior Vice President of Hasbro Brands . "A truly interactive experience, this app allows children to be part of Blythe's adventure through enhanced activities and fashion-focused fun!"
Features:
DECORATE BLYTHE'S ROOM ACTIVITY: Help Blythe feel at home in her new Downtown City apartment by choosing her room decor, furniture, and more. SKETCHBOOK PUZZLE ACTIVITY: Piece back together Blythe's fashion sketches after the Biskit twins rip them to shreds. DRESS-UP ACTIVITY: Mix, match, and create outfits in a fashion show that is not only fun, but oh-so important for saving the pet shop! FASHION PHOTOS: Once your pets are dressed up, snap a picture of them on the runway and share it with your friends! DECO BITS: Hunt for deco bits on each page of the story so you can decorate your own fashion photos! LITTLEST PET SHOP: PET STYLE from PlayDate Digital is available for $2.99 in the iTunes App Store for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch.
About PlayDate Digital Inc.
PlayDate Digital Inc. is an emergent publisher of high-quality, interactive, mobile educational software for children, designed to nurture children's emerging literacy and creativity skills. Created in collaboration with leading preschool education experts, PlayDate Digital content is built in partnership with some of the world's most trusted global brands for kids and developed and published for iOS and Android devices. More information can be found online at www.playdatedigital.com or "Like" them on Facebook and follow them on Twitter (@playdatedigital).
About Hasbro, Inc.
Hasbro (NASDAQ: HAS) is a global company committed to Creating the World's Best Play Experiences, by leveraging its beloved brands, including LITTLEST PET SHOP, MAGIC: THE GATHERING, MONOPOLY, MY LITTLE PONY, NERF, PLAY-DOH and TRANSFORMERS, and premier partner brands. From toys and games, television programming, motion pictures, digital gaming and lifestyle licensing, Hasbro fulfills the fundamental need for play and connection with children and families around the world. The Company's Hasbro Studios and its film label, ALLSPARK PICTURES, create entertainment brand-driven storytelling across mediums, including television, film, digital and more. Through the company's commitment to corporate social responsibility, including philanthropy, Hasbro is helping to build a safe and sustainable world and to positively impact the lives of millions of children and families. Learn more at www.hasbro.com , and follow us on Twitter ( @Hasbro & @HasbroNews ) and Instagram ( @Hasbro ).
